College_Summary: XLRI is one of the oldest B-schools in India, established in 1949 by a few visionary Jesuit Fathers. XLRI was ranked 9th by NIRF 2023 among the top management institutes in India. XLRI offers PGDM - BM and PGDM - HRM as its Flagship Program. Admission to the program is based on XAT scores followed by a Personal Interview and / or Group Discussions.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Innovation, Entreprenurship & Venture Development [PGDIEV]
Post Graduate Diploma in Management [PGDM] (Logistics & Supply Chain Management) + Master of Science [MS] (Supply Chain Analytics)

College_Summary: XISS Ranchi (Xavier Institute of Social Service), established in 1955, is a private management institute. XISS offers a PGDM program with a specialization in Human Resources, Rural Management, Finance, and Marketing. The PGDM program at XISS is AICTE-approved and holds equivalence to an MBA degree by AIU. XISS Ranchi has been ranked 36, among the private MBA colleges by Outlook-ICARE 2023.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Rural Management [PGDRM]

Rated #79
          out of 272
          by

College_Summary: IIT Dhanbad is an autonomous university, established in 1926. IIT Dhanbad is ranked 17 in the Engineering category, 44 in Management, 24 in Research, and 42 in the Overall category by NIRF 2023. The campus of IIT Dhanbad covers 218 acres. The most popular program at IIT Dhanbad is BTech. Apart from the flagship BTech program IIT Dhanbad also offers Integrated MTech, MTech, and MSc Courses. IIT Dhanbad BTech admission is granted as per JEE Advanced score followed by JoSAA Counselling.   Check: IIT Dhanbad Admission

BIT Mesra is one of the top technical Universities of Jharkhand. The university has been granted the ‘deemed university’ status and is located 16 Kms from Ranchi. The institution is known for its diversity where almost 58% of students are from various other Indian states. BIT Mesra's flagship course is BTech and JEE Main score is accepted for admission to the program. The BTech program is offered in 10 specializations with a 990-seat intake. JoSAA releases the JEE Main cutoff for admission in 2 categories i.e. OS (Other State) and HS (Home State). The opening cutoff for BTech admission at BIT Mesra is 13887(OS). The cutoff for all courses depends on seat availability and the popularity of the program. The total fee for the BTech program is 14.51 Lakhs and the average package offered at BIT Mesra is INR 11.57 LPA. The top recruiters of BIT Mesra include Deloitte, ICICI Bank, Cognizant, Flipkart, etc.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Hotel Management and Catering Technology [BHMCT]

College_Summary: Institute of Chartered Financial Analysts of India (ICFAI) University is a Deemed University located in Ranchi, Jharkhand. It was established in 2009. It is approved by UGC and AIU. It offers students various courses at undergraduate and postgraduate levels. The MBA course of ICFAI University is provided in 10 different specializations.

Courses_Details.Course Rating:
Rated #69
          out of 70
          by
        India Today in Law

College_Summary: Birsa Agricultural University is a state-university that was established in the year 1981 after its formal inauguration by the then Prime Minister of India, Late Smt. Indira Gandhi. The university holds the approval of UGC.

College_Name: Institute of Science and Management - [ISMR], Ranchi
College_Summary: ISMR (Institute of Science and Management, Ranchi) is ranked 40th among Hotel Management Institutes by CSR GHRDC 2009. The college offers a UG, MBA and a Diploma in Hotel Management. Admissions to ISM Ranchi is merit as well as entrance based. Candidates seeking admission to the Diploma programme need to qualify JCECE. Similarly, candidates need to qualify in CAT/MAT/XAT/CMAT or other similar entrance examinations for admission to the MBA program. Candidates can apply for admission through their official website. The placement of the college is quite impressive with the highest package being INR 5 lakhs per annum and lowest being INR 3 lakhs. Some of the potential recruiters are Vodafone, Bajaoria Entertainment Ltd, Justdial, etc.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Diploma in Hotel Management & Catering Technology

College_Summary: NIT Jamshedpur is an autonomous university, established in 1960. NIT Jamshedpur is ranked 90 in the engineering category by NIRF 2022. NIT Jamshedpur spans 341.3 acres on the outskirts of Jamshedpur. NIT Jamshedpur has 13 hostels. NIT Jamshedpur provides undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral degrees.

Courses_Details.Course Rating:
Rated #37
          out of 130
          by
        The Week in Engineering

College_Summary: Ranchi University is a State teaching-cum-affiliating university located in Ranchi. The university now spans in five districts of Jharkhand, namely- Ranchi, Gumla, Khunti, Simdega, and Lohardaga. Ranchi University offers Undergraduate, Postgraduate & Ph.D. level programs along with vocational courses in various specializations. The selection for the same is based on the merits obtained by the students in the qualifying exams.

St. Xavier’s College was established in the year 1944 by the Ranchi province and the college is affiliated to Ranchi University, Ranchi. St. Xavier’s is open for all the religions and caste of students. College provides financial assistance to the backward caste i.e. SC/ ST in the form of scholarship.

College_Name:
Bethesda Women Teacher's Training (B.Ed.) College -
 [BWTTC], Ranchi

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Technology [B.Tech] + Master of Technology [M.Tech]

College_Summary: Ranchi Women’s College located at Ranchi Jharkhand was established in the year 1949. It is a private autonomous college and is affiliated to Ranchi University. The college emerged as a light in darkness in the field of Women's Education It aims to provide quality education for women by offering UG & PG programs in sciences, art, commerce, and more. The college has well-infrastructure & facilities to provide the students with an excellent learning environment.

Birsa Institute of Technology Sindri popularly known as BIT Sindri) is located in Dhanbad district, Jharkhand. Since its establishment in 1949, BIT Sindri has been affiliated with the Jharkhand University of Technology, Ranchi. BIT Sindri is a NAAC 'A' grade accredited Institution. BIT Sindri offers 10 UG courses, 5 postgraduate and PhD courses. BIT Sindri is ranked 5th top college in Jharkhand as per NIRF 2022 and 251 out of top 300 Engineering colleges in India.

Rated #251-300

          by
        NIRF in Engineering

College_Summary: RKDF University Ranchi was established in the year 2018 by Ayushmati Education and Social Society under the Jharkhand Government Act. It is approved by UGC, BCI and holds the membership of AIU. RKDF University Ranchi offers UG, PG, Diploma and Doctoral courses in the fields of Engineering, Pharmacy, Management, Computer Application, Arts, and others. Admission at RKDF University Ranchi is conducted in the online and offline modes.

YBN University is new in the group of education institutes in India. The university offers a total of 280 courses through UG, PG, and Doctoral programs. Graduates from YBN University are placed in well-reputed companies such as Infosys, BYJU’s, Amazon, Priya Industries, NIIT, Smartprix, Wipro, SAP, Capgemini, etc.

IIIT Ranchi is recognized as an Institute of National Importance under MHRD, Government of India. IIIT Ranchi is one of the 25 Indian Institutes of Information Technology, with a concentration on information technology that was established by the Indian government. Currently, IIIT Ranchi is operating out of a temporary campus in Ranchi. 67 acres of land have been reserved in Kanke, Ranchi, for the permanent campus.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Executive Master of Technology [Ex.M.Tech] (Artificial Intelligence and Data Science)

College_Summary: All Indian Society for Electronics and Computer Technology, popularly known as AISECT University Hazaribagh is ranked amongst the fastest growing mid-size businesses in India and voted amongst the top 100 franchises. The university offers UG, PG, Diploma and PhD Courses in the discipline of Engineering, Agriculture, Law, Paramedical, Education, Management, etc. Admission to the AISECT University is done on the basis of AJEE scores. The AISECT Group and NSDC plan to set up 12 vocational training academies that will offer more than 150 university-certified undergraduates, postgraduate, certificate and diploma courses to people. The AISECT group has also launched an online open learning platform called aisectmoocs.com.

          by

Upper_Section_Details.Approval: NCTE, AICTE, PCI, INC, BCI, UGC

College_Summary: Sai Nath University, Ranchi has been established and incorporated by Jharkhand State Legislature through its official Gazette and recognized as per section 2(f) of UGC Act, 1956. The university offers Undergraduate, Postgraduate, and Diploma courses in different disciplines like Engineering, Education, Physical Education, Pharmacy, Law, Social Science, Travel 6 Tourism, Hospitality, Allied Health, Management, Communication, Jewellery Management etc. rolled out in phases. Admission to these courses is purely based on merit. The institute provides scholarship on a reguarly basis to students who belong to economically weaker section

National Institute of Foundry and Forge Technology was established in 1966 under the UNDP program. NIFFT ranks 148th best college in the Engineering colleges in NIRF 2020. Every year, the institute admits 120 students to its Undergraduate course and 116 students to the Postgraduate course. The Institute provides technical education through B.Tech., M.Tech., and Ph.D. courses. It also conducts Advanced Diploma courses in Foundry and Forge Technology.

Courses_Details.Course Rating:
Rated #151-200

          by
        NIRF in Engineering

College_Summary: Amity University, Ranchi is a private university which is a constant member in the list of India’s top 50 universities issued by NIRF. Established in 2016, the university offers various graduate and postgraduate courses among which management and engineering are most famous.The university is set by Amity Education Group and is UGC approved.

Jharkhand Rai University (JRU) is the only NAAC approved University in Jharkhand offering Undergraduate, Postgraduate, and Diploma courses in the fields of Engineering, Computer Application, Management, Pharmacy, Agriculture, and Law. Graduates from the university are placed in well-reputed companies such as Kotak Mahindra Bank, Indigo, Havells, Faurecia, Big Bazaar, Canara Bank, Pantaloons, Assocham, Axis Bank, Anand, Ashok Leyland, etc.

Usha Martin University (UMU), Ranchi is awarded "Best Innovative University - East" by the ASSOCHAM National Education Awards 2020 and “University of the Year for Faculty Excellence 2019”. UMU Ranchi offers degrees, diploma and research courses in the discipline of Engineering and Management.

Doranda College, established in 1962, is a co-educational college located in Ranchi, Jharkhand. In 1977, the college converted into a constituent college under the Ranchi University. The college offers both undergraduate and postgraduate courses in various disciplines. Additionally, it also offers Diploma course in Retail Management and vocational courses like BBA, BCA, IT, TTM, and OMSP.

Nilamber Pitamber University, also abbreviated as NPU, is one of the most famous state universities, located in Medininagar, Palamu, Jharkhand. Established in 2009, the University is authorized by the UGC. Nilamber Pitamber University govern four constituent colleges, eight affiliated colleges, two engineering colleges, one dental college and two education colleges

Upper_Section_Details.Approval: NCTE, AICTE, PCI, INC, BCI, UGC

College_Summary: Netaji Subhas University (NSU) Jamshedpur formerly known as Netaji Subash Institute of Business Management (NSIBM) is the first approved private university of Jamshedpur, established to provide world-class education amenities to the students. The university was established in the year 2018, approved by University Grants Commission(UGC), AICTE, NCTE, BCI, INC, JNRC and PCI. NSU was. The university provides students with a highly qualified team of faculty memvers who are experienced and professional in their fields.

Cambridge Institute of Technology was founded in the year 2001 at Tatisilwai, a place 16 km away from Ranchi, the capital of Jharkhand. The institute was started under the guidance of late Dr Bahadur Singh – A Social Reformer and Educationist and was promoted by the Cambridge Trust of India (Registered under Indian Trust Act). Cambridge Institute of Technology is affiliated to Ranchi University, Ranchi and Government of Jharkhand.

Courses_Details.Course Rating:
Rated #122

          by
        The Week in Engineering

College_Summary: Sarala Birla University (SBU), Ranchi is a self-financed private university. It was established in the year 2017. There are four academic schools under SBU named School of Engineering & Technology, School of Social Science & Humanities, School of Commerce & Management, and School of Yoga & Naturopathy. Presently, the university is running BCA, BBA, B.Tech, BA(H), B.Com (H), Bachelor in Yoga and Naturopathy at the UG level and MBA, Master in Yoga & Naturopathy at the PG level. Besides these, it also offers a Diploma in Engineering across 5 specializations.
Radha Govind University is a private institution located in Ramgarh, Jharkhand. It was established in 2018 with the aim of empowering the youth of Jharkhand.

College_Name: Birla Institute of Technology, Deoghar, Jharkhand
College_Summary: Birla Institute of Technology Deoghar is a constituent college of Birla Institute of Technology and a Jharkhand based premier educational institute which came into existence in October 2007 as a result of MOU signed between Government of Jharkhand and BIT to roll out intellectual brilliance in the State.

Birla Institute of Technology Lalpur was established in 1997. It is a UGC recognized Deemed University situated in Lalpur, Ranchi. BIT Lalpur offers 3 Postgraduate courses (MBA, MCA & M.Sc) and 2 Undergraduate courses (BBA & BCA). Eligibility for UG courses is 10 + 2 passed from a recognized board and the same for PG courses is Graduation passed in relevant field from a recognized university. The selection criteria for UG courses are merit-based whereas for PG courses is Entrance Exam based.

Chaibasa Engineering College is a college of higher education established in the year 2013 by Jharkhand Govt. It is run by the Techno India Group and is recognized by AICTE. The college offers Bachelor of Technology across five disciplines at the undergraduate level. Admissions are entrance-based and candidates can apply online for admission. The college has a centralized placement cell which guides the students to achieve placements in reputed companies.

Ramgarh Engineering college was established by the Govt. of Jharkhand in 2013. An AICTE approved college affiliated to the Jharkhand University of Technology, the institute offers four-year undergraduate courses across various specializations in the field of Engineering. The admission to its courses are based on the scores obtained in the JCECE or JEE examination.

Marwari College is affiliated with Ranchi University and was founded in the year 1963. It is a B++ NAAC graded institution. The college offers undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the fields of Arts, Commerce, Science, Business Administration, and Computer Application.
Capital University(CUJ) was established in the year 2018, under the recognition of UGC. CUJ is the first ‘Non-Profit Global University’ in Jharkhand, affiliated with AICTE, IHRO, and WSS.

College_Name: University College of Engineering and Technology, Vinoba Bhave University - [UCET], Hazaribagh
College_Summary: University College of Engineering and Technology (UCET) is situated in Hazaribagh, Jharkhand and was established in the year 2009. It is directly managed by Vinoba Bhave University and is approved by AICTE.

College_Name: RVS College of Engineering & Technology, Jamshedpur Overview
College_Summary: RVS College of Engineering and Technology (RVSCET), Jamshedpur established in 2004, affiliated to Jharkhand University of Technology. The college is approved by AICTE, MHRD and Govt. of Jharkhand. The college offers various undergraduate and postgraduate courses in the discipline of Engineering & Computer Application.

College_Name: KK College of Engineering and Management, Dhanbad
College_Summary: K. K. College of Engineering and Management is an engineering institute/college. It is situated at Govindpur in Dhanbad, Jharkhand. This college was established in the year 2010. All the courses are approved by the All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE).

Ramgovind Institute of Technology is a private institute established in 2004. The institute is situated in Koderma, Jharkhand helmed by Ramgovind Group of Colleges (R.G.C.) that is an initiative of the Government of Jharkhand to promote technical education across the state.

College_Name: Maryland Institute of Technology And  Management, Jamshedpur
College_Summary: Maryland Institute of Technology and Management, Jamshedpur, established in 2011, is affiliated to Kolhan University and approved by AICTE. It offers undergraduate courses in the discipline of Engineering & Technology. Admission to MITM depends on the candidate’s performance in national level entrance examinations.

College_Name: Nilai Institute of Technology - [NIT], Ranchi, Jharkhand
College_Summary: Nilai Institute of Technology, Ranchi is situated in Ranchi, Jharkhand and is also called NIT Ranchi. It was established in 2009. NIT Ranchi offers five different specializations courses of B.Tech. The admissions to the courses are done online.

College_Name: Ramchandra Chandarvansi Institute of Technology - [RCIT], Palamu
Vidya Memorial Institute of Technology - [VMIT], Ranchi
College_Summary: Vidya Memorial Institute of Technology, Ranchi Jharkhand is one of the largest education providers in Jharkhand worldwide. The trust has been providing all the facilities to the students when it comes to education.

College_Name: BA College of Engineering and Technology, Jamshedpur, Jharkhand
College_Summary: BA College of Engineering and Technology is a leading private institution of Jharkhand which was founded in 2007 with the aim to fulfill the country’s technical manpower requirement and offers an extensive range of Undergraduate and Diploma courses across different disciplines like Business Administration, Computer Applications and Engineering and Technology. The BACET is an integral part of Bihar Association - Jamshedpur, affiliated to Jharkhand University of Technology - Ranchi, approved by AICTE - New Delhi and recognized by the Department of Science & Technology, Government of Jharkhand. Admission to the institute’s programs is granted to aspiring candidates depending on their previous year’s exam result and score of Jharkhand Combined Entrance Competitive Examination or JEE-Main.

College_Name: Guru Gobind Singh Educational Society's Technical Campus, Bokaro

College_Summary: With a public-private ownership between Govt. of Jharkhand and Techno India, Government Engineering College, Ramgarh is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), New Delhi. With a highly commendable commitment towards education and moral development among youths, Ramgarh College of Engineering is a learning hub for students seeking knowledge and excellence in the field of engineering.
Ramchandra Chandravansi University(RCU), Jharkhand was set up in the year 2018, under the Jharkhand Act No 10, 2018. The university is affiliated to AICTE and recognized under the UGC.

College_Name: International School for Applied Technology - [ISAT], Ranchi

College_Summary: Gossner College, Ranchi is a minority college established in the year 1971. It aims at providing education to the underprivileged, economically backward and tribal students of Ranchi and Jharkhand. The college is affiliated to Ranchi University. It offers Intermediate, Undergraduate & Post-graduate programs in the field of Arts, Science and Commerce. Besides, there are also some vocational courses like B.Sc. (Computer Application), BBA, Information Technology, Biotechnology, Mass Communication & Video production.

Jamshedpur Women’s College is a prestigious college of higher education established in 1953. It is affiliated to Kolhan University and accredited with ‘A’ grade by NAAC. The college offers UG, PG, & Doctoral programs in the field of Science, Commerce, Arts, Business Administration, Management Studies, Gandhian Studies, & Human Rights. Apart from these, there are also vocational and add-on courses for students. The college is dedicated to provide holistic education to women along with excellent facilities and financial assistance.

Karim City College (KCC), Jamshedpur, affiliated to Kolhan University came into existence in 1961. This college was established to basically impart knowledge to the weaker section of Jharkhand specially Muslims. KCC is a private college which offers 31 undergraduate and postgraduate courses in 22 departments across 3 streams namely arts, commerce & science. KCC also provides certificates & diplomas under add-on vocational courses with different specialisations.

PK Roy Memorial College is a prestigious institute in Dhanbad, Jharkhand that got established in 1960. It is accredited with NAAC ‘B’ grade. The institute offers BA, B.Sc. and B.Com. Honours and general courses in around 23 specialization options. It also offers BBA and BCA in the UG level. In the PG level, the college provides MA, M.Sc. and M.Com. courses in around 12 specializations across various streams. Admission to these courses is done on the basis of marks in 10+2 or Bachelor’s degree in the relevant discipline and performance in the entrance if applicable.

Sindri College, Dhanbad, Jharkhand, is a government college which was established in 1964. The College has been affiliated to Vinoba Bhave University, Hazaribagh and also credited with NAAC. The College is a Constituent Unit of Binod Bihari Mahto Koylanchal University, Dhanbad.

College_Name: Orissa Institute of Interior & Fashion Technology - [OIIFT], Jamshedpur
Devki Mahavir Homeopathic College and Hospital, Garhwa
Faculty of Veterinary Science and Animal Husbandry, Bisra Agricultural University, Ranchi
International Institute of Fashion Technology - [IIFT], Ranchi
Awadh Dental College and Hospital, Jamshedpur
College_Summary: Run by

College_Name: Hazaribag College of Dental Sciences and Hospital
College_Summary: Hazaribag College of Dental Sciences and Hospital, established in 2007, is affiliated to Vinoba Bhave University. It is recognized by the Dental Council of India & Ministry of Health and Family Welfare. The college offers UG and PG courses including 4+1 (Internship) years full-time BDS and 3 years MDS with various specializations. Admission to the HCDSH is done through the national level entrance exam.

College_Name: Shine Abdur Razzaque Ansari Institute of Health Education and Research Center, Ranchi
College_Summary: The Shine Abdur Razzaque Ansari Institute of Health Education and Research Center creates an ideal opportunity for those who aspire to pursue skilled vocation in the field of health sciences, as well as its related disciplines. The college understands the immense hardships befallen on the students opting for such venture that has rendered many of the guardians of this backward state hesitant. However, the mission and the vision that they have embarked upon by launching professional courses at the institute is set to minimize the misfortunes of their students, their parents and more vitally the state itself. Since the establishers of the Institute have been well versed with providing perennial services at their hospital in Ranchi, the Institute also strives to have the same traits in its teaching, as well as curriculum.

Vananchal Dental College & Hospital, Jharkhand is an educational institution set up by Vananchal Educational and Welfare Trust. The college has been set up in order to fill the huge gap of Dental Surgeons in the society. The College aims at imparting knowledge to its students along with building awareness amongst the society in general regarding Oral Hygiene. The College also seeks to develop a research culture amongst its students in the field of Dental Education with a particular stress on oral diseases.

Chotanagpur Law College, situated in Ranchi, Jharkhand offers programs in the field of law. It was established in 1954 as a result of constant efforts by Late Barrister S.K Sahay. The institute is accredited by NAAC and affiliated to Ranchi University, Ranchi.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Arts + Bachelor of Laws [B.A.L.L.B.]

College_Summary: Central Institute of Psychiatry is a government institute established in 1918 by the British government. The institute is affiliated with Ranchi University. CIP Ranchi is spread over an area of 211 acres of land. The institute offers various PG, Doctorate, and Diploma courses in the field of psychiatry.

College_Name: Mahatma Gandhi Memorial Medical College, Jamshedpur

College_Summary: Rajendra Institute of Medical Sciences (RIMS) is an autonomous medical institute established in 1960 at Ranchi, Jharkhand. The institute was previously known as Rajendra Medical College Hospital after the name of the first President of India. It is affiliated to Ranchi University and has the approval of MCI. Presently it is running the MBBS course at the Undergraduate level and various PG Diploma, MD, MS, DM, M.Ch. & DM at the Post-graduate level. The institute has a 1500-bed multispecialty hospital and offers free medical service with medicine.

Florence College of Nursing was established in the year 2004 and is approved by INC. The College offers various Nursing courses such as GNM, ANM, B.Sc./M.Sc. in Nursing. The College also offers Diploma courses in various Paramedical fields. Admission to the College is purely based on a written entrance test and personal interview conducted by the College.

College_Name: Tata Main Hospital School of Nursing
College_Summary: Tata Main Hospital School of Nursing offers training from general practice in routine care to practice in intensive care and training in patient care in various specialities. The college provides world-class facilities to its students, which include a hostel, laboratory, library and computer lab. The main focus of Tata Main Hospital School of Nursing is to equilibrium between professional and general education to produce impeccable and efficient graduate Nurses.

College_Name: Al Iqra Teacher's Training College - [AITTC], Dhanbad
Anand Shankar Rotary BEd College, Palamu
Deepshikha Institute for Child Development and Mental Health, Ranchi

Courses_Details.Course Name: Diploma in Education - Special Education (Mental Retardation)

College_Name: GD Bagaria Teachers Training College, Giridih
Gautam Buddha Teachers Training College - [GBTTC], Hazaribagh

College_Summary: Guru Nanak College, Dhanbad is a Sikh minority college that was established in 1970. The college is known for its UG courses offered in Arts, Commerce, and Education field. The most popular undergraduate courses include BA, B.com, BCA. The college also offers various distance education courses through IGNOU such as BCA, MCA, and some PG courses.

College_Name: Jharkhand Teachers Training BEd College - [JTTC], Kodarma

College_Summary: Manrakhan Mahto Bachelor of Engineering College is a part of the Ranchi University. It is a world class co-educational college.

RTC BEd College was established in 2007 under Gramvasi  Alpasankhyak Vidhyavardhani  Samiti trust. The college offers Bachelor of Education programme. The college is a splendid growing institution which deserves all encouragement. The mission of the college is providing quality education to the masses, and providing our students for shouldering the responsibility and appreciating the privilege of the citizen in democracy. The college has good infrastructure facilities which include computer laboratory, psychology laboratory & well-furnished classrooms. The college has a newly-renovated state of the art computer laboratory with internet connection facilities. The laboratory has 15 personal computers with the latest configuration especially for the use by the students. The laboratory is also equipped with Scanning and Printing facilities.

College_Name: Radha Govind Teachers Training College, Ramgarh
Sri Ramakrishna Sarada Ashrama Teacher's Training College, Hazaribagh
Ursuline Primary Teacher's Education College, Lohardaga
Ursuline Women's Teachers' Training College - [UWTTC], Lohardaga
Sajjad Institute of Information Technology - [SIIT], Ranchi

College_Summary: Kolhan University is a premier institution located in Jharkhand that has been established in the year 2009. It has 16 Constituent Colleges and 29 affiliated colleges. At present, the university offers various courses at Undergraduate and Postgraduate level. Admission to the academic programs is done on the basis of merit obtained in the last qualifying exam, whereas, an entrance test is conducted for some courses. The application process of the university involves both online and application process.

National University of Study and Research in Law (NUSRL), Ranchi was established by Act No.4 of Jharkhand State Assembly in 2010. The University became operational with Prof. A.K. Koul as its first Vice Chancellor and 48 students enrolled in the first batch. It offers 5 year integrated B.A. (Hons.) L.L.B (Hons.), 3 year integrated L.L.M PhD and PhD of 2 years. The University is dedicated to compete with Global Academic Standards by its skillfully woven teaching – learning methodology.

College_Summary: Sido Kanhu Murmu University is a public University situated in Jharkhand and was established in the year 1992. It offers UG, PG and vocational programmes in numerous streams. The university has 13 constituents and 15 permanently affiliated colleges.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Library and Information Science [B.Lib.I.Sc]

College_Summary: Vinoba Bhave University (VBU) started in 1972 and has a good B++ grade from NAAC. Located at a distance of 100 km from Ranchi, VBU is headquartered in Hazaribag, North Chotanagpur division of the state of Jharkhand. The state-owned university has a lush green campus spread over 67.17 acres. Vinoba Bhave University is also funded by Indian government agencies.

College_Name: Vananchal Educational and Welfare Trust, Garhwa
College_Summary: Vananchal Educational & Welfare Trust, Garhwa, Jharkhand has been organized for the promotion of spiritual, physical, mental, mental, educational and cultural development and uplifting of adult and children of all ages without any discrimination on the basis of caste or religion and in the overall interest of mankind in general. It also aims to make the Rural and urban masses self-reliant, by opening Handicrafts Centers, Vocational Training Centers, Small Cottage Industries, Bio-Technology Development Centers, Software Parks, Typing/Computer Education, etc. in which people will be given opportunities.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Rural Management [PGDRM]

College_Name: Jain Institute of Management & Entrepreneurship - [JIME], Jamshedpur

College_Summary: Bokaro Steel City College, Bokaro, Jharkhand is a general degree college which is one of the premier educational institutions in the state of Jharkhand. It is a government college established in 1970. It was made into a constituent college of Ranchi University in 1978. It is currently a prestigious constituent college in Binod Bihari Mahato Koylanchal University, Dhanbad.;

Jamshedpur Cooperative College was established in the year 1949 and is accredited by NAAC. The College offers UG and PG programme in numerous specializations. The admission in different courses is based on merit.
Ganesh Lal Agrawal College is a general degree college in Medininagar, Jharkhand, established in 1954 and it provides both Undergraduate and Postgraduate courses in Science, Commerce and Arts.

Dr. Shyama Prasad Mukherjee University, Ranchi (formerly known as Ranchi college) was established in 1946 as a college and upgraded to a university in 2017. DSPMU offers around 39 courses spread across different streams like Humanities, Science, and Social Science. Apart from this, the university also offers various Certificate, Diploma and Vocational Courses along with Doctoral Degrees. Admission to Undergraduate and Postgraduate courses is based on the merit list prepared on the basis of marks obtained in the concerned subjects at Intermediate or Honors level respectively. Admission to Vocational/ Self-finance courses is on the basis of the Entrance exam conducted by the concerned department. It is mandatory for the candidate to appear for the Entrance Test in order to apply for such courses.

St. Columba's College, which was earlier known as Dublin University Mission College was established in 1899. It is accredited to UGC and is affiliated to Vinoda Bhave University. The College was started as a Grade- B university, with its affiliation from Calcutta University in the year 1899 and soon got upgraded to a Grade- A university in 1904 because of its outstanding performance. The process of admission at the college is done online. Admissions for BA and B.Sc. are merit-based and that for BCA are based on an entrance test EAT, followed by an interview.

College_Name: Lal Bahadur Shastri Memorial College - [LBSM], Jamshedpur
College_Summary: Lal Bahadur Shastri Memorial (LBSM) College, was established in the year 1971 in the state of Jharkhand. The institute is affiliated to Kolhan University and is located at Chaibasa in West Singhbhum district. LBSM has been accredited by NAAC.

College_Name: Markham College of Commerce Hazaribagh Jharkhand
College_Summary: Markham College of Commerce, Hazaribagh, Jharkhand is a Government College which was established in 1974 and is one of the constituents of the Vinoba Bhave University. The College has been accredited by NAAC Grade B and scored 2.3 and has also been approved by UGC.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Library and Information Science [B.Lib.I.Sc]

College_Summary: Central Institute of Mining and Fuel Research (CIMFR), an autonomous institute, is India’s largest research and development organization. Apart from the main campus in Dhanbad, there are 6 other campuses all over India. The institute is under the guidance of the Council of Scientific and Industrial Research (CSIR). The educational institution has been awarded the National Geoscience Award, National Technology Award, and the National Mineral Award and many others.

College_Name: S.N. Sinha Institute of Business Management, Ranchi
Institute of Management Studies, Ranchi University - [IMS], Ranchi
College_Summary: Institute of Management Studies (IMS), Ranchi University, was established in 2002. The IMS, Ranchi University, has four major disciplines - Marketing, HR, Finance, and IT. It offers 2 years of full-time MBA course and 3 years of Executive MBA course. Candidates who are seeking admission to IMS need to pass the entrance exams such as CAT, MAT, XAT, CMAT, and ATMA. The application mode is online.

Sanjay Gandhi Memorial College, established in the year 1980, is run by the Jharkhand Social and Educational Development Association. The college is located in Pandra and Kamre, Ratu Road, Ranchi, Jharkhand and it is affiliated permanently to Ranchi University.

College_Name: Ram Lakhan Singh Yadav College - [RLSY], Ranchi
College_Summary: Ram Lakhan Singh Yadav College, Ranchi, Jharkhand is a government Institute which was established in 1972 in the city of Ranchi. It is affiliated to the Ranchi University and accredited by the National Assessment and Accreditation Council (NAAC).

Krishna Ballav College, established in the year 1964, is situated in Bokaro district, Jharkhand. The college is a constituent college of Vinoba Bhave University, Hazaribag under the guidelines of the University Grants Commission Act 1956 (UGC) Sec. 2 (f) and 12 ‘B’.

Raja Shiv Prasad college is a government college situated in Dhanbad, in the state of Jharkhand, India. This institute was established in the year of 1949 in the memory of Raja Shiv Prasad's father. It was affiliated to Vinoba Bhave university and accredited with NCTE and NAAC.

Harshita Global Educational Academy (HGEA) College of Pharmacy became operational in 2017 under the aegis of Dr. Keshav Baliram Hedgewar Educational Trust, Bokaro. It offers a two-year Diploma in Pharmacy course. Admission to HGEA College of Pharmacy is given on a first come first serve basis. Applications can be made online as well as offline.

DMS IIT Dhanbad is among the top B-Schools of the country, ranked at 44th position in NIRF 2023 Ranking. DMS IIT Dhanbad Admission is offered for popular programs such as MBA and MBA (BA). The admission is offered through the CAT entrance exam for MBA and MBA (BA) courses. For Ph.D programs, GATE/CAT score is compulsory with minimum 60% aggregate marks. The M.Tech Industrial Engineering and Management course is offered through GATE score.

College_Name: Kejriwal Institute of Management & Development Studies - [KIMDS], Ranchi
College_Summary: Kejriwal Institute of Management and Development Studies (KIMDS), Ranchi established in 2009 is part of the Kejriwal Education Charitable Trust (KECT). KIMDS is an AICTE approved management institute that offers 2 years of PGDM course. Admissions take place on the basis of CAT, XAT, MAT, CMAT ranks or through our own selection process known as the KAT test. KIMDS’s PGDM products have secured 100% placement in 2019. Some of the top recruiters who came for on-campus placement are ITC, ICICI Bank, BYJU’S, Britannia, Extramarks, Greenply, etc.

K.K. Polytechnic College stands out as the most eminent and efficient polytechnic college in Jharkhand. Established in the year 2006, this AICTE approved college is noted for giving the best education in the polytechnic or diploma engineering covering the total five streams excluding Applied Science and Humanities.

Institute of Hotel Management, Ranchi was established in 2019 by the joint effort of Government of India and Government of Jharkhand. The institute is affiliated to the National Council for Hotel Management Catering Technology (NCHMCT) and is located in the backdrop of a picturesque town in Brambe. The campus is spread over an area of 10 acres with a total built-up area of nearly 20,000 square metres. The institute is autonomous and aims to provide local recruits for the tourism industry.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Science [B.Sc] (Hospitality and Hotel Administration)

College_Summary: Jharkhand Raksha Shakti University is a state university established in 2016 by the Govt. of Jharkhand. This University is first of its kind in Jharkhand and third in the country which provides Certificate, Diploma, and Degree Courses in the field of Police Science and Internal Security wherein candidates/youth gets the opportunity to build their career in the state police, central police, military, and other private security forces. Admission to the courses is offered on the basis of the common entrance exam conducted by the university.

College_Name: NIPS School of Hotel Management, Ranchi

Courses_Details.Course Name: Diploma in Hotel and Catering Management [DHCM]

College_Summary: Government Polytechnic Latehar (GP Latehar) situated in Latehar, Jharkhand was founded on 1994. It is approved by AICTE and affiliated to DTE of Jharkhand state. The college offers four diploma courses in the engineering stream.

Government Polytechnic Adityapur (GPA), Jamshedpur, Jharkhand was established in the year of 1980. It is one among the 17 polytechnic colleges in the State of Jharkhand. It offers diploma courses in various Engineering branches. Admissions to this reputed college is strictly based on the entrance. Thus, the candidates need to appear for Jharkhand Combined Entrance Competitive Examination Board (JCECEB), followed by the counselling session. After the counselling session, the selected candidates will be allotted colleges on the basis of order of merit and preference made.

Cambridge Institute of Polytechnic (CIP), Ranchi, is one of the emerging private institutes in Jharkhand offering various diploma programs. It got established in 2016 and is situated at Ranchi on the state of Jharkhand. It has an affiliation with the Jharkhand University of Technology (JUT) and the institute is approved by AICTE. The admission process is entrance-based that accepts Jharkhand Polytechnic (PECE) exam scores after a subsequent counselling process. Average salary package after pursuing a diploma course here is around INR 1.68 LPA.

College_Name: SBS College Of Management & Science, Ranchi

Courses_Details.Course Name: Bachelor of Journalism and Mass Communication [BJMC]

College_Summary: The Government Polytechnic Nirsa Dhanbad, formerly known as the Mining Institute Dhanbad, was established in 1958 with the Department of Science and Technology, Government of Jharkhand. The institute offers 3 Diploma courses: in Mining Engineering, Civil Engineering, and Mechanical Engineering. Admissions are on the basis of the JCECE examination conducted by the JCECE Board, Ranchi.

Located in Ranchi, Church Road, The Government Polytechnic Campus is one of the oldest and most popular colleges established in 1935. The College offers Diploma courses in the field of Civil Engineering, Computer Science and Engineering, Electrical Engineering and Electronics and Communication. The admission is done on the basis of the PECE Examination conducted by the JCECE Board. Aspirants can apply by visiting the official site of the college and filling out the admission form.

College_Name: Xavier Institute of Polytechnic and Technology - [XIPT], Ranchi
College_Summary: Xavier Institute of Polytechnic and Technology is located at Bargawa, Namkum. The institute is affiliated to Jharkhand University of Technology (JUT) and is approved by AICTE. XIPT is known among the top-rated Colleges in Jharkhand with an excellent academic track record.

Beharagora Polytechnic at Baharagora was set up in the year 2017 in the state of Jharkhand by the Government of Jharkhand. The college is approved by AICTE and offers various diploma level courses. The college has 4 academic departments that conduct on campus courses for eligible students.

Silli Polytechnic College, established in 2013 is the first Public-Private Partnership College. The institute is located in Ranchi, Jharkhand. The courses offered include 5 AICTE approved Diplomas of 3 years duration. Lateral entry admissions are also accepted. Admissions to the courses are on the basis of the JCECE scores, but candidates can also apply for direct admission through the institute website. The top recruiters of the college include Tata Motors, Timken India Ltd., Infinity, Mahle, and many more.

Government Polytechnic Dhanbad was established in 1998 at Dhanbad, Jharkhand. The Institute only provides Diploma Courses with specializations namely: Civil Engineering, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Metallurgical Engineering, and Computer Science and Engineering. Admissions into the institution are done on the basis of the Entrance Exam for all the Courses. The list of students received from JCECE decides the admission of the Candidates. The main objective of the Institute is to provide all the facilities to the students where the students can learn to face the challenges in life.

Government Polytechnic Bhaga previously known as Mining Institute Bhaga was founded in 1905. It is under the administrative control of DHTE (Department of Higher & Technical Education), Jharkhand Govt. The institute offers diploma programs in Mining, Food Technology, and Computer Engineering. For admission to polytechnic courses, candidates need to qualify the entrance exam conducted by the JCECEB, Ranchi.

Government Polytechnic Kharsawan is located in the state of Jharkhand. It was established in the year 2006. It is affiliated to the State Board of Technical Education, Jharkhand and approved by AICTE, Govt. of India.

College_Name: Rajeev Gandhi Memorial Teacher's Training College - [RGMTTC], Dhanbad

College_Summary: Al-Kabir Polytechnic (AKP), Jamshedpur was established in the year 1990 with the efforts of the Kabir welfare trust. It is approved by AICTE, Government of India, and recognized by SBTE, Jharkhand Government. The institute provides a Polytechnic diploma course with six main specializations in the field of engineering.

Government Polytechnic Khutri (GPK) is a leading educational institution established in Bokaro, Jharkhand. Since its initiation, the college has forged several diploma engineers by holding specialization in various disciplines. The institution is funded by the State Board of Technical Education, Jharkhand, while it offers AICTE approved Diploma Courses. In order to become eligible for admission, the applicants must have qualified 10th standard, with a qualifying mark of 35% marks or equivalent. The selection of the candidates will be entrance-based.

Vishweshwaraiya ITI (VITI), Dhanbad is one among the prominent technical institutes in the state of Jharkhand. The college works under the society of Samajik Kalyan Sanstha. It is affiliated to NCVT (National Council for Vocational Training), New Delhi. The College provides diploma Courses in different streams to its students. The institute also provides the students with a lot of opportunities to explore their inner abilities and skills. The Minimum Criteria for admissions into this College is completion of Class 10th and don’t have any criteria for ranking. The college helps its students to gain knowledge as well as practical skills which can help them to gain success in their future.

Chandil Polytechnic is a technical institute which is affiliated to the Jharkhand University of Technology (JUT) . The institution is approved by the AICTE. It was established by the Government of Jharkhand and is run by Gurunanak Polytechnic Foundation under P.P.P Mode. There are various Diploma courses offered under the specializations like Mechanical, Civil, Electrical Engineering, Electrical and Electronics, and Automobile Engineering. The admission is carried out on the basis of an entrance exam. Few of the companies which have visited this institute for placement are IBM, Bajaj, Tata Motors, Wipro, Sigma, HCL, and Tech Mahindra, etc.

Gola Polytechnic College at Gola in Jharkhand was established in the year 2016 by the Government of Jharkhand and is run by the Gurunanak Technical Foundation. It is a Private University and it is approved by AICTE. It offers 5 Diploma courses in the Engineering stream. Within a short span of time, the college has gained quite a momentum in the state of Jharkhand for its diploma courses. Admission is strictly done on the basis of merit and candidates have to fill the application form online.

College_Name: Girija Institute of Polytechnic College, Ramgarh
College_Summary: Girija Institute of Polytechnic College is a private Institute located in Ramgarh, Jharkhand. The Institute has been founded by Girija Memorial Welfare Trust of India. It was established in 2018 with a vision to be a centre of excellence in education, research, and training and to create future leaders. It is affiliated to Jharkhand University of Technology.

College_Name: Sarojini Institute of Technology, Ranchi, Jharkhand
College_Summary: Sarojini Institute of Technology is a Ranchi-based renowned private college that came into existence in 2014 and offers 2 Undergraduate and Diploma courses in the discipline of Computer Applications, Business Administration and Engineering. The institute is affiliated to Jharkhand University of Technology - Ranchi, approved by AICTE and admission to its courses is granted based on marks obtained by a candidate in the previous year’s qualifying exam while final selection takes place via Jharkhand Combined Entrance Competitive Examination Board and Open Counseling at college counter.

Centre for Bioinformatics, Ranchi is one of the premier colleges providing quality education through a Diploma program in the discipline of Engineering and Technology. It strives to offer the best education to tribal regions of Jharkhand. The institute provides 100% placement assistance to students through Aptitude test, Group Discussions, Mock Interviews and Technical Tests.

College_Name: Sri Ram Teachers Training College - [SRTTC], Ranchi
College_Summary: Sri Ram Teachers Training College (SRTTC), Ranchi, established in the year 2016 with the objective of providing quality education in the field of Teacher Education. The college is recognized by NCTE, Bhubaneshwar and affiliated with Ranchi University (RU), Ranchi and Jharkhand Academic Council. SRTTC offers B.Ed and D.EL.ED programs and all-round training program packages to Primary and Secondary teachers.

College_Name: Santosh College of Teacher’s Training & Education - [SCTTE], Ranchi
College_Summary: Santosh College of Teacher’s Training and Education (SCTTE), Ranchi is operated by Society for Nature Education and Health (SNEH). The institute offers B.Ed and D.El.Ed programs approved by the National Council for Teacher Education (NCTE). Admission is done on the basis of merit.

College_Name: Shrinivas Institute of Paramedical Sciences - [SIPS], Hazaribagh
Sahyog College of Medical Sciences, Khunti
Vanachal Institute Of Health Education And Research, Garhwa
Vananchal College of Nursing & Vananchal School of Nursing, Garhwa
Aerospace Research and Development Centre - [ARDC], Jamshedpur

College_Summary: Established in 2018, Netaji Subhas University Campus is powered by Sunstone’s Edge, Jamshedpur. The institute offers AICTE approved BBA and MBA programs. It is a leading management college of Jamshedpur, Jharkhand. Admissions are done on the basis of marks obtained in various national and state entrance exams. The institute has witnessed 100% placement for its MBA program. The highest package is offered at INR 10 LPA. NSU Campus also provides a 9 month paid internship to gain hands-on industry experience.

College_Name: Pushkar Group School of Nursing Traning, Ranchi

College_Summary: Srinath University is a premier university in the state of Jharkhand. Srinath University offers B.Tech, B.Sc (Hons), B.A. (Hons), B.Ed, B.F.A, B.Com (Hons), BBA, BCA and B.A. at the Undergraduate level, offers MBA, M.A., M.Sc, M.Com and MCA at the postgraduate level and offers pH.d course at the doctoral level. Admission to the courses offered will be done based on the candidate's performance in the previous qualifying examination.

College_Name: Gyan Jyoti College of Pharmacy, Hazaribagh
DAV institute of Engineering and Technology, Palamu
St. Barnabas Hospital College of Nursing, Ranchi
Hill View College Of Nursing, Ranchi
R S Teachers Training College, Dhanbad
N.N. Ghosh Sanatan Teachers Training College, Ranchi
Shaheed Sheikh Bhikhari College Of Education - [SSBCE], Ranchi
Kunwar Singh Pharmacy College of Education, Giridih
Bokaro Institute of Medical and Health Science -[BIMHS], Bokaro
Ideal Academy of Nursing Education, Ranchi
BNTC School of Nursing and Paramedical Science, Jamshedpur

College_Summary: ARS BEd College is a self-financed and distinguished private institution of Dhanbad, which was founded in 2012 and offers Undergraduate and Diploma courses in the disciplines of education and elementary education with the aim to produce competent, committed and caring teachers. The college is affiliated to Binod Bihari Mahto Koyalanchal University (BBMKU), managed and administered by A.R.S. Memorial Educational Society for Human Welfare and recognised by NCTE Bhubaneswar.

College_Name: Dhanbad Institute of Technology, Jamshedpur, Jharkhand
College_Summary: Dhanbad Institute of Technology, founded in 2023, is a private institution in the Indian city of Jamshedpur. The college is an integral part of the Drona Group of Institutions. It offers an Undergraduate course in the allied discipline of Engineering, intending to transform students into highly technical professionals.

MBNS (Mahant Bidya Band Saraswati) Institutes is a well-known private college located in the Indian city of Jamshedpur. It was founded with the aim to produce globally-relevant leaders and offers Undergraduate, and Diploma courses in Arts, Commerce, Business Administration, Pharmacy, Nursing, and Science. The institution is approved by the National Council for Teacher Education, and affiliated to Kolhan University of Chaibasa. Admission is granted to aspiring candidates depending on the merit of last year's qualifying exam.
